trans-unit.source: To learn more, please read our {privacyPolicy}.
trans-unit.target: To learn more, please read our {privacyPolicy}.

trans-unit.source: Services we would like to use
trans-unit.target: Services we would like to use

trans-unit.source: Here you can assess and customize the services that we'd like to use on this website. You're in charge! Enable or disable services as you see fit.
trans-unit.target: Here you can assess and customize the services that we'd like to use on this website. You're in charge! Enable or disable services as you see fit.

trans-unit.source: There were changes since your last visit, please renew your consent.
trans-unit.target: There were changes since your last visit, please renew your consent.

trans-unit.source: Hi! Could we please enable some additional services for {purposes}? You can always change or withdraw your consent later.
trans-unit.target: Hi! Could we please enable some additional services for {purposes}? You can always change or withdraw your consent later.

trans-unit.source: These services are essential for the correct functioning of this website. You cannot disable them here as the service would not work correctly otherwise.
trans-unit.target: These services are essential for the correct functioning of this website. You cannot disable them here as the service would not work correctly otherwise.

trans-unit.source: These services process personal information to optimize the service that this website offers.
trans-unit.target: These services process personal information to optimize the service that this website offers.

trans-unit.source: These services process personal information to show you relevant content about products, services or topics that you might be interested in.
trans-unit.target: These services process personal information to show you relevant content about products, services or topics that you might be interested in.

trans-unit.source: These services process personal information to show you personalized or interest-based advertisements.
trans-unit.target: These services process personal information to show you personalized or interest-based advertisements.

trans-unit.source: These services gather anonymous data for statistical analysis and performance optimization. Enabling analytics services assists website owners in making informed decisions to enhance online services.
trans-unit.target: These services gather anonymous data for statistical analysis and performance optimization. Enabling analytics services assists website owners in making informed decisions to enhance online services.

trans-unit.source: Security services are crucial for safeguarding your online experience. These services help protect your data and privacy by detecting and preventing security threats, such as malware, phishing attempts, and unauthorized access. They ensure a safer browsing environment.
trans-unit.target: Security services are crucial for safeguarding your online experience. These services help protect your data and privacy by detecting and preventing security threats, such as malware, phishing attempts, and unauthorized access. They ensure a safer browsing environment.

trans-unit.source: Live chat services enable real-time communication with website support teams. They offer a convenient way to ask questions, seek assistance, or engage in discussions while browsing a website. Live chat enhances your online interaction and customer support experience.
trans-unit.target: Live chat services enable real-time communication with website support teams. They offer a convenient way to ask questions, seek assistance, or engage in discussions while browsing a website. Live chat enhances your online interaction and customer support experience.

trans-unit.source: Services related to styling help to improve the appearance of the website. This can also have an impact on usability.
trans-unit.target: Services related to styling help to improve the appearance of the website. This can also have an impact on usability.

trans-unit.source: A simple service that I install on my computer.
trans-unit.target: A simple service that I install on my computer.

trans-unit.source: Several simple services that I install on my computer.
trans-unit.target: Several simple services that I install on my computer.

trans-unit.source: Use this switch to enable or disable all services.
trans-unit.target: Use this switch to enable or disable all services.

trans-unit.source: This services is loaded by default (but you can opt out)
trans-unit.target: This services is loaded by default (but you can opt out)

trans-unit.source: Do you want to load external content supplied by {title}?
trans-unit.target: Do you want to load external content supplied by {title}?

trans-unit.source: Google AdSense enables personalized ads on websites while respecting user privacy. By consenting, you allow relevant ads and help support free content.
trans-unit.target: Google AdSense enables personalized ads on websites while respecting user privacy. By consenting, you allow relevant ads and help support free content.

trans-unit.source: Consent to the use of surveillance camera images for security and safety purposes, in compliance with applicable data privacy regulations.
trans-unit.target: Consent to the use of surveillance camera images for security and safety purposes, in compliance with applicable data privacy regulations.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Clarity is a user-friendly web analytics tool that empowers website visitors like you by providing transparency about how your interactions are tracked on a website. It ensures your privacy is respected while giving developers and website owners valuable insights into user behavior. Plus, it follows coding guidelines and best practices, ensuring a safe and secure online experience for you.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Clarity is a user-friendly web analytics tool that empowers website visitors like you by providing transparency about how your interactions are tracked on a website. It ensures your privacy is respected while giving developers and website owners valuable insights into user behavior. Plus, it follows coding guidelines and best practices, ensuring a safe and secure online experience for you.

trans-unit.source: Cloudflare helps protect and optimize websites. By using this website, you consent to Cloudflare's data processing practices as described in its Privacy Policy.
trans-unit.target: Cloudflare helps protect and optimize websites. By using this website, you consent to Cloudflare's data processing practices as described in its Privacy Policy.

trans-unit.source: Simplifies web tracking for analytics and marketing while ensuring data compliance and control.
trans-unit.target: Simplifies web tracking for analytics and marketing while ensuring data compliance and control.

trans-unit.source: Web analytics service provided by Google, Inc. ("Google")
trans-unit.target: Web analytics service provided by Google, Inc. ("Google")

trans-unit.source: Google Maps allows for the integration of interactive maps on websites, enabling location-based services. Developers can utilize it while ensuring data compliance and control, adhering to coding guidelines and best practices.
trans-unit.target: Google Maps allows for the integration of interactive maps on websites, enabling location-based services. Developers can utilize it while ensuring data compliance and control, adhering to coding guidelines and best practices.

trans-unit.source: Google Tag Manager streamlines web tracking and code management, ensuring data compliance and control for developers.
trans-unit.target: Google Tag Manager streamlines web tracking and code management, ensuring data compliance and control for developers.

trans-unit.source: Chat widget & collecting of visitor statistics
trans-unit.target: Chat widget & collecting of visitor statistics

trans-unit.source: Open source software for statistical analysis of visitor accesses
trans-unit.target: Open source software for statistical analysis of visitor accesses

trans-unit.source: Real-time user analytics service that helps to understand how visitors interact with our website.
trans-unit.target: Real-time user analytics service that helps to understand how visitors interact with our website.

trans-unit.source: X (formerly Twitter) is social media platform that allows users to share and interact with short messages and multimedia content. Developers can integrate Twitter features into websites to enhance user engagement and real-time updates while maintaining data privacy compliance and adhering to coding guidelines.
trans-unit.target: X (formerly Twitter) is social media platform that allows users to share and interact with short messages and multimedia content. Developers can integrate Twitter features into websites to enhance user engagement and real-time updates while maintaining data privacy compliance and adhering to coding guidelines.

trans-unit.source: Userlike offers a live chat solution that enhances user interactions on websites.
trans-unit.target: Userlike offers a live chat solution that enhances user interactions on websites.

trans-unit.source: Popular video-sharing platform that offers a range of features for creators and developers to enhance video content on websites.
trans-unit.target: Popular video-sharing platform that offers a range of features for creators and developers to enhance video content on websites.

trans-unit.source: The leading video-sharing platform for content creators and developers to enhance user experiences on websites.
trans-unit.target: The leading video-sharing platform for content creators and developers to enhance user experiences on websites.
